alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 12:59PM CDT until July 02 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lincoln County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ardmore, or 12 miles southwest of Fayetteville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Skinem, Molino, Coldwater, Blanche, Belleview, Harms, Taft, Camargo and Cash Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
